nl.fcdonders.fieldtrip.bufferserver

Class BufferServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.fcdonders.fieldtrip.bufferserver.BufferServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BufferServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Buffer class, a thread that opens a serverSocket to listen for connections and starts a connectionThread to handle them.
    Author:
    wieke, jadref

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferServer(int portNumber)
      Constructor, creates a simple datastore.
      BufferServer(int portNumber, int nSamplesEvents)
      Constructor, creates a ringbuffer that stores nSamplesEvents number of samples and events.
      BufferServer(int portNumber, int nSamples, int nEvents)
      Constructor, creates a ringbuffer that stores nSamples of samples and nEvents of events.
      BufferServer(int portNumber, int nSamples, int nEvents, java.io.File file) 
      BufferServer(int portNumber, int nSamples, int nEvents, java.lang.String path) 
      BufferServer(java.lang.String path, int portNumber)
